name: EssenceOfDeath
description:
Try to clear the dungeon and die as little as possible.
Many centuries ago, people who were not able to die began to appear in the world, people who possessed the essence of death, crystals that were full of magical powers. Possessing superhuman power, such knights went into the dungeons with only one goal - to destroy all the wickedness. For them, it was just a competition in who would need fewer deaths and used energy resources.

Control with WASD for move and Left Mouse for attack. 

Hold TAB for opening your essence list.  After every death you become stronger and get new Death Essence, but lose gained earlier.
